properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 3:27PM MST until February 6 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds gusting up to 60 mph.

* WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to midnight MST Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along
Interstate 90 from Springdale through Livingston, and on roads
near Nye.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow will also occur, drastically
reducing visibility. Light snow will occur Wednesday night into
Thursday morning.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT
